<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Etheric Shards](/Spells.aspx?ID=1152)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 105

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You reach out and sow glittering splinters of force throughout the area, otherworldly caltrops of will and ectoplasm. The area is difficult terrain, even to flying or [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures. Any creature that moves through the area takes 1d4 piercing damage per square traversed, with a basic Reflex save made at the end of each move action they take through the area.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The spell's area increases by 5 feet, and the piercing damage increases by 1.
name: Etheric Shards
